name: Hic-Man
description:
Tonight's the big mission! The mayor's holding an elaborate birthday party to hide all the corruption he's done to your small town. As Agent 894, you have been sent to poison all his food and take him down once and for all as being the short king that you are, you can easily slip past the guards. One slight issue...that Taco Bell Crunchwrap Supreme was too good for a starving man and you ate it too quickly, and now you've been plagued with unstoppable hiccups! Can you still sneak past the guards with ever-present hiccups? 

Arrow keys or WASD to move
Spacebar or E to interact

Code, Level "Design", Art by dododot
Sound by freesound.org
Music by  Shane Iver
